_comment: Add a _ before an option name to comment it out and it wont be added to the apworld
Using 'goal' as the name of an option let you override some of the generated goal parameters
goal.description: How to End your Randomized playthrough.

description: Which mode would you like to play on?
Story Mode: Played in story mode. Restart from stage 1 if you die more times than you have life items. Clear stage 9 to receive ending items.
Match Mode: Played in match mode vs computers. Survive a specified amount of time against opponents. Defeat final opponents to receive ending items.

match_random.description: [Match Mode] Should character opponents be randomized? If false, characters you fight will be ordered similar to story mode.

endings_required.description: How many ending items should be required to goal?

description: [Story Mode] Should life items be required to make stage 6, 7 and 8 in-logic?
3 Lives: 1 life item makes stage 6 in-logic, 2 life items for stage 7, 3 life items for stage 8.
2 Lives: 1 life item makes stage 6 in-logic, 2 life items for stage 7 and 8.
1 Life: 1 life item makes all 3 stages in-logic.
None: All 3 stages are in-logic without the need of life items.

story_difficulty_end.description: [Story Mode] How many life items should be required to make stage 9 in-logic?

match_difficulty_minimum.description: [Match Mode] What should be the minimum required survival time to make opponents in-logic?

description: By default, 1 minute is the shortest time for starting opponents and the shortest possible time for final opponents.
match_difficulty_minimum may need to be increased to compensate.

ayamedi_difficulty.description: Should Aya and Medicine require any of their progressive items to make their locations in-logic?

description: Out of the enabled ones, how many characters do you want the randomizer to pick and choose who stays enabled and disable the rest?
Do note that having too many characters enabled can make sessions take some time to complete.
